pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Shang1 ye4 Ji1 qi4

definition: (dialect) motorcycle/abbr. to 機車|机车[ji1 che1]

sentences.english: In Love + Sex With Robots, Levy explains how human-robot love can become a reality.
sentences.chinese: Levy在書中說人與機器間的愛情可以成爲現實。

sentences.english: Don't do this on an old, slow machine.
sentences.chinese: 不要在速度慢的舊機器上這麼做。

sentences.english: Such machines are called space rockets.
sentences.chinese: 這種機器就稱爲宇宙火箭。

sentences.english: Connect this part to the machine.
sentences.chinese: 把這個零件安到這臺機器上。

sentences.english: Jacobian matrix is one of the important parameters of robots.
sentences.chinese: 雅可比矩陣是描述機器人特徵的重要參數之一。

sentences.english: Therefore, collectivity design on The Underwater Ship Hull Cleaning Robot is finished.
sentences.chinese: 完成了船體表面清刷機器人的總體設計。

sentences.english: But we ourselves are not just machines.
sentences.chinese: 但我們自己不只是機器。

sentences.english: Sadly enough, the generator was all but forgotten during World War II.
sentences.chinese: 但不幸的是，這些機器在二戰期間被完全遺忘廢置。

sentences.english: Check if this machine has a public IP address.
sentences.chinese: 檢測這臺機器是否有一個公網IP地址。

sentences.english: So who made the machines? That's who we want to contact.
sentences.chinese: 那誰造的這種機器？我們要和他接觸。

sentences.english: They send in the robots to do the work.
sentences.chinese: 他們把機器人送進去完成工作。

sentences.english: This machine is called rings-type tackle.
sentences.chinese: 這種機器叫吊環型滑車。

sentences.english: From life machines to vaccination man has vastly improve the standard of living.
sentences.chinese: 從生命機器到疫苗接種，人們大大地提高了生活水平。

sentences.english: The buzz droids are designed to disable, not destroy, enemy craft.
sentences.chinese: 蜂鳴機器人的設計目的是癱瘓，而非摧毀敵機。

sentences.english: The world famous brand electrical control components to ensure long-term trouble-free operation of the machine.
sentences.chinese: 世界名牌電器控制元器件，確保機器長期無故障運行。

sentences.english: The machine stops and starts at a touch.
sentences.chinese: 這臺機器一觸按鈕就可以啓動或停下。

definition: to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
entity/substance/thing that has a material existence (as opposed to a conceptual, virtual or online existence)/the real thing (as opposed to an image or model of it)
